name: Year 10: The Game
description: Hello! This is just a short game that I made for fun and for a school project! This is also the first game I have ever made so it might not be the best; this is basically just a game about making friends at a new school! Side note: this game is a W.I.P, so updates might come soon, though I am not so sure. Either way, I hope you enjoy! :]
